Texts.Chs: 在第一个格中放置一类种子。在第二个格中放置一类液体来培养植物。第三个格用来放肥料。^green;不同的肥料^reset;将影响植物的^green;产量和生长速率^reset;。
Texts.Eng: In the first slot, place a seed. In the second, place a liquid to feed the plant with. The third slot is for fertilizer. ^green;Different fertilizers^reset; will result in ^green;different production and growth rates^reset; for plants.

Texts.Chs: 虽然你可以选择用锄头、泥土和你的双只手来耕作的古老方式，但还有一个选择：^orange;木制托盘^reset;。现在就在^orange;采集工作台^reset;建造一个，任何时候你都能培育植物。
Texts.Eng: While you can farm the old-fashioned way with a hoe , dirt and your own two hands there is another option: ^orange;Growing Trays^reset;. Build one of these at a ^orange;Foraging Table^reset; now, and you'll have some plants grown in no time.
